Slavica started recently to plant and purchase different fruits and vegetables and create various healthy juices. Her business is starting to be known in the area and she has many customers that continue to purchase her drinks. While she is able to make her juice from her home and travel to various markets in the area to sell her products, Slavica hopes that she will soon have her own shop where she can make and sell her juices.

At this time she is requesting a loan in order to purchase a machine for making various types of juices. She is very optimistic that her business will further improve, and she loves what she does.

loans.use: to purchase a machine for making various types of juices.

loans.name: Gjystine

texts.en:
Gjystine has been struggling without any teeth at all in her mouth all these past years, according to her. " I had no money and never took care of my mouth, thus, all my teeth fall off or the dentist pulled them out. It has been very difficult eating and speaking without teeth," said Gjystine.
Gjystine is 52 and a widowed mother of a 22-year-old son. 'My husband died in a traffic accident when our son was five-year-old and since then life became very difficult for me. I had to find a job and raise my son and there was no job in this little town we live. We received no compensation either with my husband's passing," said Gjystine to the branch assistant.

Gjystine lives with her son in a one-bedroom apartment; she's been working late night shifts in a bakery during these past few years and her son, has just finished his high school and the academy of sports.

She now wants to pay for some dentures.

loans.use: she has been without teeth at all for a few years now and she is scheduled to go for some dentures

loans.name: Kumrije

texts.en:
Kumrije has two daughters and two sons who she loves very much. Her husband used to work in a factory but now receives a pension, so Kumrije's family earns a living through their family construction business. Her sons, who are adults, do free lance construction work, building and improving various structures based on client demand. 

Kumrije helps them to maintain and clean the working equipment, and also searches for clients and potential work. Now, she is requesting a loan to purchase a scale and other equipment for construction. She is hoping that this loan will help them to work more efficiently and provide better quality and more services. She promises to pay on time and appreciates the support from the lenders.

loans.use: to purchase a scale and other equipment for construction to expand her business

loans.name: Maguette's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe fait partie du banc villageois qui été crée le 29 en mai 2010. Il est composé de femmes qui sont très solidaires et très dynamiques, qui entretiennent de bonnes relations depuis des années et s’activent dans le commerce et l’embouche.
MAGUETTE debout à droite de la photo levant la main gauche est l'emprunteuse vedette, elle âgée de 48 ans, mariée et mère 4 filles et 3 garçons. Elle s’active dans l'embouche depuis des années et a acquis une grande expérience dans ce domaine.
Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter deux moutons à 25 000 FCFA l'unité. Elle achète le bétail dans un marché prés de sa localité et le revend dans le même marché à 40 000 FCAF l'unité après élevage.
Avec les bénéfices, elle compter aider son mari dans les charges familiales notamment  en achetant de la nourriture pour la famille mais aussi renforcer son épargne dans le banc villageois.
texts.en:
This group is a part of the 'banc villageois' that was created on May 29, 2010. It is made up of women who are very supportive and very energetic who have had a good relationship for years and work in commerce and raising livestock.

Maguette, standing on the right side of the photo with her left hand raised, is the star borrower of the group. She is 48 years old, married, and has four girls and three sons. She has been raising livestock for years and has gained a lot of experience in this field.

With this loan, she intends to purchase two sheep at 25,000 francs apiece. She buys livestock in a market near her neighborhood and resells them in the same market at 40,000 francs apiece after raising them. With the profits, she intends to help her husband with family expenses, in particular, buying food for the family but also increasing her savings in the 'banc villageois.'

loans.use: to buy two sheep.

loans.name: Shauri

texts.en:
Shauri is a 39 year old father of four whose wife provides additional income.

He is a livestock trader and also offers taxi transport services at Kilifi, a businesses he has run for the last nine years.

This is his fourth loan from VisionFund Kenya to finance his businesses, after successfully repaying the previous loans. He will use the loan to repair his taxi and purchase livestock for resale.

With the anticipated profit, he will be able to pay school for his children.

He hopes to own several taxis in future.

loans.use: to repair his taxi and purchase livestock for resale

loans.name: Hannahley

texts.en:
Hannahley is 30 years old and married with five children.  With all five children in school, Hannahley works very hard to provide for them.

Hannahley has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Hannahley has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as bread, biscuits, sugar and other groceries. 

In the future Hannahley would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Cristina

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer soltera de 40 años de edad que se encuentra solicitando un apoyo financiero para impulsar su actividad de elaboración de artesanías en porcelana.
Ella es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora que quiere posicionar su producto y hacer de su hobby un medio de generación de ingresos para su mantenimiento.
Este apoyo para ella será muy importante, es el inició de una actividad que quiere posicionar, quiere rescatar ese bello proceso de elaboración manual y conservar esa hermosa costumbre
texts.en:
Sandra is a single 40-year-old woman who is requesting financial support in furtherance of her work producing porcelain handicrafts.
She is a determined, enterprising woman who wants to position her product and support herself by making her hobby income-producing.
This support will be very important for her. It's the beginning of a work activity she wants to position, she wants to rescue this lovely process of production by hand and preserve this beautiful custom.

loans.use: to buy porcelain for the production of her crafts.

loans.name: Nyame Bekyere Group

texts.en:
The group of Nyame Bekyere is made of two dedicated member who are connected to their trade of selling coking oil, garden eggs, onion and pepper at the market place of teshie in the Greater Accra region of Ghana.

Patience is a single parent with three children all is the SHS level of education, she live with the children in a rented apartment, this hardworking woman with such responsibilities was able to use her previous loan to pay school fees, rent,and the repayment of loan with easy.

Her business is yielding much profit but she luck much money to purchase more food stuffs for sell due to the demand of her regular customer,she therefore seek a loan from Kiva through ID-Ghana to buy more food stuffs to satisfy the need of her customers.

loans.use: to buy more food stuffs to satisfy the need of her customers.

loans.name: Muhamed

texts.en:
Muhamed wants to thank all of the lenders for their previous loan. He used it to repair his saw which sustained damage through wear and tear over the years, and was also able to renovate his workshop where he keeps his saw and cuts his wood.

Muhamed is still in the same business and now needs another loan to purchase a new wood-cutting machine because his is already damaged. He is very thankful for the loans, as he is working hard to increase his income and take care of his children and home expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a new wood-cutting machine.

loans.name: Deivid Yesid

texts.es:
Deivid, un joven de tan solo 19 años de edad, una persona cuyo deseo de ayudar económicamente a su madre lo lleva a solicitar por primera un crédito para iniciar un negocio de cafetería en la terminal de transporte de Honda.
Por este motivo pide apoyo a toda la comunidad Kiva para que le brinden la posibilidad de tener su negocio con el que sueña generar ingresos y ser útil en su hogar.
Ya cuenta con el local, necesita el dinero para comprar enseres, surtido, la cafetera, nevera y adecuar el local.
texts.en:
Deivid is only 19 years old, a person whose desire is to help his mother economically. She brought him to seek his first loan to start a cafeteria business in the Honda transport terminal. For this reason he asks for support from the entire Kiva community to provide him the possibility of having his own business that he dreams of to generate income and be useful in his home.

He already has the locale. He needs the money to buy equipment, inventory, a coffee maker and a refrigerator, and to prepare the locale.

loans.use: to buy equipment, inventory, a coffee maker and a refrigerator, and to prepare the locale.

loans.name: Nhum's Group

texts.en: Nhum’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Nhum makes a living cultivating rice and he also does work as officer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.	.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida, who is 20 years old and engaged, has always helped her family by keeping cows and selling their milk and dairy products. Her father works on other people's land in order to earn a living, but his income has never been sufficient to fully meet the family's needs. Aida thus began working very early in her life with the cows to help supplement their income.

Until recently, Aida and her family lived in a very small and old home, but have now managed to obtain a new home. They had to sell various assets including their cow to be able to finish their home. For this reason, Aida is in need of a loan to purchase another milk cow. She is very happy to have this opportunity to soon be able to start to sell milk and dairy products again and continue to help provide for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Luz Melia

texts.es:
Ella es Luz Meliá, es una mujer casada de 48 años de edad, madre de una pequeña de 14 su actividad principal es ser ama de casa, estar al pendiente de su esposo e hija, velando por su buena educación.
Ella vive en un humilde hogar, entiende que para tener calidad de vida y darle un buen futuro a su hija tiene que trabajar y más sabiendo que su esposo a pesar de que es un gran trabajador, no gana mucho salario.
Ella para generar recursos sin descuidar a su familia, decidió iniciar con la venta de bebidas, cervezas y refrescos principalmente los cuales vende desde su casa, esos ingresos extras han representado un cambio de vida y una mejora de calidad de vida notoria.
al estar próximos a entrar a la temporada de diciembre, la señora Luz Meliá quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecerse de cerveza y refrescos, pues dicha temporada es la de mayor consumo de estos productos.
texts.en:
Luz Meliá is a 48 year old married woman. She is the mother of a 14 year old girl. Her primary activity is as a homemaker, taking care of her husband and daughter, and making sure her daughter gets a good education. She lives in a humble home. She understands that in order to have a good quality of life and to give a good future to her daughter, she has to work, particularly since her husband doesn't earn much, despite being a great worker.

In order to generate income without neglecting her family, she decided to start selling drinks, beers and sodas primarily, which she sells from her home. This extra income has represented a change of life and a notable improvement in her quality of life. Since the December season is approaching, Luz Melía wants to seek a loan to stock up on beer and sodas, as it is the season when the largest amount of these products is consumed.

loans.use: to stock up on beer and drinks, for the end of the year season.

loans.name: Ndiague's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 3 membres fait partie du banc villageois  qui a été crée  en novembre 2009. Il regroupe des femmes très solidaires et très dynamiques qui s’activent principalement dans le commerce et l’embouche. Une bonne ambiance anime les réunions de groupe.
FATOU  debout à droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est l’emprunteuse vedette, elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée et  mère de 6 enfants dont  trois  garçons et trois  filles. Elle s’active dans l’embouche et fait parallèlement du commerce de mil, niébé et d'oseille.
Avec le prêt, elle compte acheter dans un marché prés de sa localité deux bœufs l’unité à 100 000 FCFA.  Elle compte aussi acheter de l’aliment de bétail pour une valeur de 50 000 FCFA. Parallèlement, elle compte aussi faire du commerce de mil, d’oseille et de niébé hebdomadairement dans le même marché. Elle va acheter  5 bassines d’oseilles, 25 kilogrammes de niébé, et 20 kilogrammes de mil qu’elle va revendre.
Les bénéfices serviront à renforcer son épargne au niveau du banc villageois d'une part, et d'autre part à participer à des tontines.
texts.en:
This three-member group is a part of the 'banc villageois' that was created in November 2009. It groups together very supportive and very energetic women who engage primarily in commerce and raising livestock. The group meetings have a positive atmosphere.

Fatou, standing on the right side of the photo with her left hand raised, is the star borrower of the group. She is 44 years old. She is married and has six children, three boys and three girls. She raises livestock and, at the same time, sells millet, beans, and sorrel.

With this loan, she intends to buy two steers at 100,000 francs apiece at the local market. She also intends to buy 50,000 francs worth of livestock feed. At the same time, she intends to sell millet, sorrel and beans weekly at the same market. She is going to buy 5 basins of sorrel, 25 kilograms of beans, and 20 kilograms of millet that she will resell.

On the one hand, the profits will serve to strengthen her savings with the 'banc villageois' and on the other, to participate in life insurance.

loans.use: to buy 2 steers, 5 basins of sorrel, 20 kilograms of millet, 25 kilograms of beans.

loans.name: Antonio Farid

texts.es:
Antonio es un joven emprendedor de 21 años de edad, el cual inicio un negocio de venta de artículos decorativos para el hogar. Inició su actividad por necesidad económica, vive en una zona de postconflicto.
Las ganas de salir adelante y ayudar a su madre se ven reflejadas en la intensidad horaria del cliente, puesto que trabaja 12 horas diarias.
Buscando generar más ventas, tener un surtido fresco y diferente, el cliente solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de artículos decorativos para mesa y para la sala común.
Su objetivo es generar ingresos para su crecimiento empresarial, para ayudar en su casa y poder estudiar.
texts.en:
Antonio is an enterprising 21-year-old youth, who started a business selling decorative items for the home. He started his business out of economic necessity since he lives in a post-conflict zone.
His desire to move ahead and to help his mother are reflected in his intense schedule, since he works 12 hours daily.
In his search to generate more sales and offer a fresh and diverse inventory the client requests a loan to buy inventory of decorative items for the table and living room.
His aim is to generate income for business growth, to help out at home, and to be able to study.

loans.use: to buy inventory of decorative items for the table and living room.

loans.name: Julio Abel

texts.es:
Julio es un hombre de 53 años de edad se dedica a vender productos de la canasta familiar, es separado pero tiene una hija de 28 años de edad.
Trabaja en un humilde negocio desde el año 2014, ya que por necesidad económica abrió el local y hasta el momento ha podido sobrevivir con los ingresos que genera.
Trabaja 15 horas diarias, es un hombre luchador que quiere sacar su negocio adelante.
Julio entiende las falencias que tiene como empresario, muchos de ellos en infraestructura y exhibición, pero no es un inconveniente que pueda solucionar fácilmente ya que no cuenta con recursos y trabaja con lo que tiene a su alcance, por ello hoy quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar materiales para realizar adecuaciones, en distribución, exhibición e inventario.
texts.en:
Julio is a 53 year old man who works selling staple goods. He is separated and has a 28 year old daughter. He has worked in a humble business since 2014, when from economic necessity he opened the locale. Until now he has been able to survive with the income it generates. He works 15 hours a day. He is a fighter, who wants to move his business forward.

Julio understands the shortcomings he has as a businessman, many of them in infrastructure and display. But these aren't problems he can solve easily, since he lacks resources and works with what he has. For those reasons, he wants to seek a loan today to buy materials to make renovations in distribution, display and inventory.

loans.use: to buy materials to make renovations in distribution, display and inventory.

loans.name: Juan Diego

texts.es:
Juan Diego es un joven soltero, una persona emprendedora, trabajadora el cual constituyo un negocio de reparación de motocicletas en el municipio de Copacabana, inicio su actividad desde el año 2009, buscando la independencia económica y ayudar a su madre en todo lo que le fuera posible y más.
Aunque presta sus servicios de una manera informal, su sueño es constituir un local, sigue ahorrando para adquirir uno y trabajar cómodamente.
Juan Diego actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar repuestos de motos en cantidades, tales como pastas de frenos, aceite, espejos, repuestos comúnmente solicitados por los clientes.
Este préstamo servirá para abastecerse, teniendo en cuento que tiene un precio elevado y le es más rentable comprar en cantidades.
texts.en:
Juan Diego is a single young man. He is an enterprising, hard-working person who started a business repairing motorcycles in the municipality of Copacabana. He started his business in 2009 looking for financial independence and to help his mother in any way he can and more.

Although he offers his services in an informal manner, his dream is to construct a shop and he continues to save in order to acquire one and work comfortably.

Juan Diego is currently requesting a loan to buy motorcycle parts in quantity like brake pads, oil and mirrors, parts that are commonly requested by customers.

This loan will allow him to stock up, keeping in mind the parts are high priced and it is more profitable for him to buy in quantity.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts in quantity like brake pads, oil, mirrors, amongst others.

loans.name: Mariel

texts.en:
Mariel is 30 years old, married with three children. Two of whom are in school, she is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Mariel has a fishing business in the Philippines. Mariel requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Mariel has been in this business for nine years. In the future, Mariel would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
The lady in the photo is Irene. She is 23 years old with 5 children. She practices maize, beans and runs a firewood yard. Having undergone Hand in Hand Eastern Africa training on savings and enterprise development she is now able to run the business more effectively. She is borrowing a loan from Kiva, which she intends to use in buying more firewood for resale. She looks forward to more income that will help boost farming.

She is very grateful to Kiva and hand in hand for the support and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy more firewood that will help boost sales.

loans.name: Deysi Magdalena

texts.es: Deysi tiene 22 años de edad y vive con su grupo familiar desde hace 15 años en vivienda propia, por lo que se siente feliz de contar con un lugar propio para vivir. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que cuenta con una tortillería en su vivienda, lo cual le permite sacar adelante a su familia, por medio de su negocio. Deysi desea invertir en su negocio, ya que no cuenta con la materia prima para la elaboración de sus productos, por lo que ella solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar maíz por mayor y mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en: Deysi is 22-years old and has lived with her family for 15 years in their own home, which she feels happy to be able to have her own place to live. She is a hard-working woman that has a tortilla stand in her home, which allows her to support her family through her business. Deysi wants to invest in her business because she does not have the ingredients to make her products. So, she is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy wholesale corn and to improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn for her tortilla sales.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria hails from the town of Carmen, Bohol. She toils the land and grows vegetables like eggplant and ampalaya (bitter gourd). She delivers and sold it to the local market in her place.
She has been growing vegetables for 10 years now. She is married and has three grown children.

She would like to improve her farm , but she has very limited resources to make it productive.
Gloria has requested a loan to buy fertilizer, vegetable seedlings and medicine. These will truly brings improvement and bountiful yield. Thus, continue to manage her finances and start to save for future use.

Gloria is thankful to Kiva for the support and in return she is doing her best to make an impact and improve the living condition of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, vegetable seedlings and medicine

loans.name: Racquel

texts.en: Racquel lives a simple life with her family in the town of Catigbian, Bohol. She is married and has three children; ages nine, six and four years old. Her husband works hard as a carpenter while Racquel is engaged in basket making for 11 years. Aside from this, she also sells dried fish to the community for additional income. Racquel’s biggest dream in life is to improve her business to have enough money to send all her children to college and with that; they could have a better life in the future. To do this, first she needs to improve her products and her sales. And this is the reason why she is asking for loan. She needs to buy raw materials for basket making; specifically rattan stem (a tropical palm). In addition to this, she will also buy dried fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for basket making; specifically rattan stem; dried fish

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is 47 years old, married and has four children. One of whom is in school.

Olive is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Olive requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Olive has been farming vegetables for 25 years now, and has borrowed 17 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Olive would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Tusaidiane Group

texts.fr: Mwenge est une entrepreneuse, vendeuse des denrées alimentaires, membre du groupe de credit «Tusaidiane», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 49 ans et mère de cinq enfants dont 4 étudient et 1 est marié. Elle va acheter trois sacs de maïs pour renforcer ses activités. Elle commença ses activités par le capital reçu d’un crédit depuis 4 ans. Elle compte construire une maison et scolariser ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancable
texts.en:
Mwenge is a businesswoman who sells groceries. She is a member of the Tusaidiane Group, a client of the field partner Hekima. She is a 49-year-old, married mother of five children, four of whom are in school and one of whom is married.

She is going to buy three bags of corn to strengthen her business. She started her business with the capital she received from a loan four years ago. She intends to build a house and pay for her children's schooling. Lastly, she would like to thank Hekima for the support that it provides entrepreneurs outside of the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy three bags of corn.

loans.name: Merla

texts.en:
Merla is 45 years old and married with three children. One of whom is in school.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Merla is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Merla has been farming vegetables for twenty years and also earns additional income from fattening pigs and general store businesses.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Aldemar De Jesus

texts.es:
Aldemar un hombre serio, responsable, estricto y comprometido con el progreso de su empresa y su familia, tiene 27 años de edad, se dedica a vender mercancía en un local que ha ido adecuando y organizando hace dos años.
Es padre de una pequeña de 4 años de edad, su principal objetivo es comprar una vivienda, asegurar su educación y tener un local conformado por varios empleados, que atienda muchos clientes, así se sueña su futuro.
Para crecer, ampliar su surtido, atender la demanda de diciembre y constituir un local atractivo para el público, el señor Aldemar quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar 3 vitrinas exhibidoras, mejoras locativas en iluminación, pintura y comprar surtido de accesorios y cosas varias.
texts.en: Aldemar is a serious, responsible, strict and dedicated man with the progress of his business and family. He is 27-years old and works selling merchandise in a shop that he has been adapting and organizing for 2 years. He is the father of a small 4-year old girl. His main goal is to buy a home, ensure the education of his daughter and to have a shop with various employees who attend to many customers. This is how he dreams of his future. To grow, increase his supply, cater for the December demand and build an attractive shop for the public, Aldemar wants to ask for a loan to buy 3 showcases, better lighting, paint, and to buy a supply of accessories and various things.

loans.use: to buy 3 showcases, better lighting, paint, and to buy a supply of accessories and various things.

loans.name: Miradije

texts.en:
Miradije is a mother of two children and is the family's main source of income, as her husband is retired. She works a lot, in a public hospital and privately for a family, as a housekeeper. She has been doing this work for more than 13 years. She is satisfied with her work and the income she is able to generate. 

At this time she is requesting a loan to purchase a machine for cleaning. This will help her to work more efficiently and effectively, and even generate more income for her family, as she will be able to take on additional jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase a machine for cleaning

loans.name: Agron

texts.en:
Agron is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support in helping him to repair his taxi. The loan he was given ensured that he had a safer mode of transportation and that his vehicle was running efficiently.

He has been able to continue his business and hopes that he will be able to continue well into the future as his goal is to have his own full taxi company.

At this time, Agron is again requesting a loan so that he can complete some necessary services and repair his vehicle again from the wear and tear that it has sustained since his last loan. The loan will help him to be able to continue providing reliable and safe services and ensure his income is stable.

loans.use: to repair his taxi vehicle to continue providing reliable and safe services and ensure his income is stable.

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es:
En el año 2014, guiado por la necesidad económica el señor Javier inicio con un negocio de venta de cerveza y refrescos, tiene la responsabilidad de mantener una familia conformada por 4 hijos y su pareja con quien vive en unión libre y gracias a su perseverancia ha sacado su familia adelante.
Javier ha convertido su negocio en una pequeña distribuidora ya que solo vende al por mayor, una noticia muy gratificante para el cliente y un compromiso de seguir progresando y luchando por su familia, ese es el camino.
Ya que la temporada de diciembre representa la temporada de mayo consumo de licor, Javier solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerveza en grandes cantidades.
texts.en:
In the year 2014, guided by economic necessity, Javier started a business selling beer and sodas. He has the responsibility of supporting his family, consisting of 4 children and his common law partner. Thanks to his perseverance he has moved his family forward.

Javier has converted his business to a small distributorship, as he only sells wholesale, which is good news for the customer. With a promise to continue progressing and fighting for his family -- that is the path he's on. As the December season is the season when the most liquor is consumed, Javier seeks a loan to buy beer in large quantities.

loans.use: stock up on beer.
